citations.narrative:
On September 5, 2025, husbandry staff found a snake in the Seba's short-tailed bat enclosure. The black rat snake was
immediately removed and checked for a microchip. The microchip reading confirmed it was the same snake from the
07/29/25 predation incident. A radiograph of the snake confirmed that 2 bats were consumed. The snake was released a
third of a mile from the bat cave.
The facility staff re-evaluated the bat enclosure and found several additional areas of entry. The enclosure was not
maintained in a manner that prevented the entry of an unwanted species resulting in the death of the bats. NOTE: At the
time of inspection, the holes were repaired.
Correct by ensuring that the housing enclosure for the bats are kept in good repair to protect the animals.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.125(a)  Critical Repeat
   
Facilities, general. 
On September 5, 2025, husbandry staff found a snake in the Seba's short-tailed bat enclosure. The black rat snake was 
immediately removed and checked for a microchip. The microchip reading confirmed it was the same snake from the 
07/29/25 predation incident. A radiograph of the snake confirmed that 2 bats were consumed. The snake was released a 
third of a mile from the bat cave.  
 
The facility staff re-evaluated the bat enclosure and found several additional areas of entry. The enclosure was not 
maintained in a manner that prevented the entry of an unwanted species resulting in the death of the bats. NOTE: At the 
time of inspection, the holes were repaired. 
 
Correct by ensuring that the housing enclosure for the bats are kept in good repair to protect the animals. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
